title: Aw van leng rual zai thiamte u
lyrics:
AW, van leng rual zai thiamte u,
Chhandamtu pianna hla;
Leiah rem leng rawh se, tiin
In la zai fo lo'm ni?
Hmanah zai hla rem mawi,
Suria leng in awihna;
Lairilah a cham reng,
Aw, van aw mawite u.

Aw, nang enna mawi leh duhawm,
Van ropuina puangtu;
Ram loh lui thiang cham del chungah,
Berampu tuannaah,
Zan thianghlim ber ang khan,
Beisei, lawm leh ringin;
Min awmpui reng ang che,
Aw, eng mawi leh duhawm.

Hmangaiha min tlantu hnena,
Hruailu chung leng siar,
Van zawl kawlkung khi zawng ila,
Kan la tawng leh ang che'm?
Kawlrawn zawng i liam lo,
I eng a chuai chuang lo;
Kan tan lo eng ve rawh,
Hruailu siar ropui.
